[quote=“reyx7, post:4, topic:402143”][quote author=badger41 link=topic=499097.msg3651166#msg3651166 date=1309741400]

Or woodcutting, right now it looks very bad, when you chop trees, you chop until they fall, and then you split the tree up into logs, once the whole tree has been cut away, then a new one will spawn.

How about you just punch the middle of the tree and top be suspended in air? That’s how it normally happens.

Dont know why you would even mention that method considering whats required and how stupid that would look with 3 or 4 trees really close to each other

Successful troll is successful.

reported for trolling then
[/quote]
Nub.
Why are we talking about skilling on a clan wars topic?[/quote]

item.title: The sky is falling
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:22, topic:402041”][quote author=marcbob link=topic=499097.msg3649785#msg3649785 date=1309647954]
Why the fuck can’t they just add a new skill?
[/quote]
Because there is nothing else to make a skill out of unless you want 99 pet grooming.[/quote]
I would love that.

Read full topic

item.title: The sky is falling
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Or they could take some time to improve their skills to make them more dynamic, such as fishing, you should be able to stand on the bank anywhere close to a lake or river and cast your line with various lengths etc (alot like minecraft fishing is right now, except for the ability to hook land animals) and what fish you are going to catch determines what tackle you use.

Or agility, why should we have defined shortcuts to be able to use, we should be able to hop a fence anywhere given we have the agility level

Or woodcutting, right now it looks very bad, when you chop trees, you chop until they fall, and then you split the tree up into logs, once the whole tree has been cut away, then a new one will spawn.

These are some i just thought off of the top of my head but my point being they should stop trying to add “new” features to a skill and instead go back and improve the entire structure and working of that skill to make it much more dynamic.

Read full topic

item.title: The sky is falling
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“buut15, post:20, topic:402041”]I was trying to talk to my best friend after finishing my farm run. When I looked at the door to go in her house, there was a rock in the way and it wouldn’t let me reach it!
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2s77s01.png[/img

When I went the long way to talk to her, I was trying to leave her house. When it wouldn’t let me reach it, I had go the long way again.
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/dxb503.png[/img

I am not going to her house for a while…[/quote]

Lol’d. Jagex should revert to 459 and we’ll all be happy.

Read full topic

item.title: The sky is falling
item.dc:creator: @buut15 buut15
item.description:
@buut15 wrote:

I was trying to talk to my best friend after finishing my farm run. When I looked at the door to go in her house, there was a rock in the way and it wouldn’t let me reach it!

When I went the long way to talk to her, I was trying to leave her house. When it wouldn’t let me reach it, I had go the long way again.

I am not going to her house for a while…
